name: Pepper Pirates
description:
In a world where pepper is the ultimate propulsion, you are chosen among the deadliest mermaids to try and stop the renowned Pepper Pirates from turning the salty seas too salty for you to live in.

Swim around the ship and climb up to take down the pirates one by one.
Combine nearby ingredients into cocktails to make the pirates too drunk to take you down.


A VR game made for Nordic Game Jam 2023.

Team:

  • Alexander Førgaard Nielsen: Artist
  • Sune Nilausen: Programmer
  • Mathies Wiencke: Programmer
  • Patrick Hou Frogberg: Programmer
  • Thomas Vase Schultz Volden: Programmer
